sailpoint.tools.ldap
Class Schema

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.tools.ldap.Schema

public class Schema
extends java.lang.Object

A Schema represents the object classes and attribute definitions returned from an LDAP schema. Usually created by LDAPUtil.getSchema(DirConext).

Constructor Summary
Schema(java.util.List<java.lang.String> objectClassDefs, java.util.List<java.lang.String> attrDefs)
          Constructor.
 
Method Summary
 AttributeDefinition getAttributeDefinition(java.lang.String attrName)
          Return the AttributeDefinition with the given name from this schema, or null if there is no definition for it.
 ObjectClass getObjectClass(java.lang.String objectClassName)
          Return the ObjectClass with the given name from this schema, or null if there is no definition for it.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Schema

public Schema(java.util.List<java.lang.String> objectClassDefs,
              java.util.List<java.lang.String> attrDefs)
Constructor.

Parameters:
objectClassDefs - The strings with the RFC 2252 object class definitions for an LDAP server.
attrDefs - The strings with the RFC 2252 attribute definitions for an LDAP server.
